# Simpsons quotes finder

Futurama quotes finder, made with Gatsby.js

## Framework and Dependencies

* react - https://reactjs.org
* react-redux - https://github.com/reduxjs/react-redux
* prop-types - https://www.npmjs.com/package/prop-types
* gatsby - https://www.gatsbyjs.org
* material-ui - https://github.com/mui-org/material-ui/
* jest - https://github.com/facebook/jest


## Development server

* Clone the project - `git clone https://github.com/sanjivkrish/Simpsons`
* Install the dependencies - `yarn install`
* Start the project with npm - `gatsby develop`
* You will be able to open the project on http://localhost:8000

## Build

* Start the project with npm - `gatsby build`
* You can move on your server the `/public` folder

## Staging

The production ready app is accessed at https://futurama-quote-finder.netlify.com/

## Note

Many characters does not have quotes. Try following names to visually see some quotes

* Zapp Brannigan
* Calculon
* Flexo
* Morgan Proctor
